t.name: description
t.value:
Measure 2 - Goal Follow-up: % of individuals 18 years of age or older with
a complex care need who received follow-up on their PCO goal within two
weeks to six months of when the PCO goal and GAS or PROM were
identified.

t.name: description
t.value: Includes individuals 18 years of age and older.

t.name: description
t.value: Initial Population individuals with a complex care need and has a PCO Goal.

t.name: description
t.value:
Indivuals who received follow-up on their PCO goal within two
weeks to six months of when the PCO goal and GAS or PROM were identified.
